data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was obtained, analyte type, tumor status of sample, primary or metastatic tumor, and tumor location of participants with cancer and involved in the "Megabase-scale Haplotyped Genomic Analysis of Normal and Cancer Genomes" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample
